name: Box Boxing
description:
Box Boxing is a simple game that I made about two players trying to knock each other off a platform by dashing into one another. The game is simple in both looks and how it is played. 

Two boxes are fighting against each other for glory to claim the very land that they spar on. Only one may emerge victorious.

Recommended to play with two people as this game will most likely not be fun when playing alone.
